page.title: 20OAKENGATES LEISURE CENTRE.
page.content: {ALL IN A DAYS WORK! A caretaker's day {0800-0900}Instructing Lifesaving Club. {0900-0930}General cleaning duties {0930-1000}Lifeguard- advanced swimmers {1000-1100}Put out apparatus in Games Hall- Gym Club. {1100-1200}General cleaning- Multi-gym {1200-1230}Lunch break {1230-1300}Lifeguard- senior members of Lifesaving Club {1300-1500}Cleaning Games Room and Coffee Bar for social function in evening {1500-1600}General security duties pool side dressing room. {1600-1630}Final check. {1630-1930}Home {1930-2400}Back at work,general duties during dance and football presentation. {2400-0330}Cleaning up,security check, lock up ,home to bed!
